original_text: The woman's husband will be jealous, and he will become very angry. He will want the man to receive full punishment. The woman's husband will be jealous, and he will become very angry. He will want the man to receive full punishment. The woman's husband will be jealous, and he will become very angry. He will want the man to receive full punishment.
korean_text: 남편이 투기로 분노하여 원수 갚는 날에 용서하지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: The woman's husband will be jealous
and he will become very angry
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 매우 화가 날 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will want the man to receive full punishment
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 남자가 온전한 형벌을 받기를 원할 것이다
